content: Grupo Folha is the third largest Brazilian media conglomerate whilst Universo Online (UOL) is a web content, products and services Brazilian firm. However, it is still unclear who was behind the whole scheme. The deface message itself was asking users to click on a cat to read group’s background but upon clicking, they were redirected to RedTube

argument.text: click on a cat to read group’s background

info.title: Brazil's largest news portals UOL and Folha hacked; redirected to RedTube
